body.bibl: Joosse, Nanne Peter. “Between Enigma and Paradigm: The Reception of Aristotle’s Politica in the Near East: The Arabic and Syriac-Aramaic Traditions.” In Well Begun Is Only Half Done: Tracing Aristotle’s Political Ideas in Medieval Arabic, Syriac, Byzantine, and Jewish Sources, edited by Vasileios Syros, 97–120. Medieval and Renaissance Texts and Studies 388, Medieval Confluences 1. Tempe, Arizona: Arizona Center for Medieval and Renaissance Studies, 2011.

Vasileios Syros, Medieval and Renaissance Texts and Studies 388, Medieval Confluences 1 (Tempe, Arizona: Arizona Center for Medieval and Renaissance Studies, 2011), 97–120.
